revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #17 Ango (Mago) |image = [[File:Mago.png]] |caption = Se va curvando conforme crece, tornándose más dulce y sabrosa. |growtime = 6m 10s |harvest = 16 bayas |replant = 30% |mutation = 0.7% |points = 50 |flavor =
*0 picante *0 seco *15 dulce *0 amargo *0 ácido }} '''Ango (Mago)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|granja]]. Se puede obtener rodeando una parcela con al menos de 25 y no más de 80 puntos dulces y menos de 5 puntos de cualquier otro sabor. Se requiere haber desbloqueado la baya [[Pecha|Meloc (Pecha)]] para desbloquear esta baya. == Tablas de Crecimiento == === Estados de Crecimiento === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Brote !! Crecimiento !! Floración !! Madurez |- ! Tiempo pasado desde que se planta | 40 seg || 3 min || 4 min || 6 min 10 seg - 12 min 20 seg |- ! Animación |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MagoTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MagoTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MagoTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Tiempos de Maduración con modificadores=== {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificador !! Tiempo hasta la madurez-marchitado |- ! Ninguno | 6 min 10 seg -
12 min 20 seg |- ! Abono/Psydugadera | 4 min 7 seg -
8 min 13 seg |} == Diagrama de Flujo == [[File:Mago_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
'''Leyenda:'''
· Random Drop: Obtenido aleatoriamente en ruta
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Mago berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] |- | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] |- | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Mago berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Pomeg.png|20px]] [[Pomeg]] || [[File:Iapapa.png|20px]] [[Iapapa]] |- | [[File:Qualot.png|20px]] [[Qualot]] || [[File:Pinap.png|20px]] [[Pinap]] |- | [[File:Magost.png|20px]] [[Magost]] || [[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]]
[[File:Nanab.png|20px]] [[Nanab]] |- | [[File:Roseli.png|20px]] [[Roseli]] || [[File:Nanab.png|20px]] [[Nanab]]
[[File:Magost.png|20px]] [[Magost]]
[[File:Watmel.png|20px]] [[Watmel]] |- |}
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Flower Paradise|Common}} {{LootItem|Relic Castle|Common}} {{LootItem|Abundant Shrine|Common}} {{LootItem|Lush Jungle|Common}} |} |}
